author: timbeiko
content: This actually is super smart. Can't we just add a folder to the eips repo `/attachments` and tell people to add their links as pdfs under `/attachments/eip-x/`?

author: timbeiko
content: It adds a _bit_ of friction to EIP authors, but not a ton, and keeps reviewing very easy. Also, the only type of attachment I would disallow is basically a list of links, but we don't really need editors to monitor whether the attachments themselves have links (which they likely will). If the second degree links are broken, we can easily live with that.
